name: RedBull CPD
description:
Red Bull Car Park Drift

Will you be crowned the King of Drift? Drift like a pro through 4 adrenaline-pumping tournaments and show us what you've got.

Drift against opponents across the globe and amp up your skills one course at a time.

Make it all the way to the Regional Final and unlock a special Bonus Track to win a real-life drift with Abdo Feghali!

The Game takes drifting to new heights with stunning graphics, unparalleled game modes, and addictive courses.

Earn points by showing off your drift skills, getting crowd support via Facebook, and car customization.

Developed, Published:
Pixel Punch
